--- # title: "Présentation de TidyModels" # subtitle: "R addict" # author: "Clément Rieux" # date: '22 Septembre 2022' format: revealjs: footer: "[github.com/clem_rxx](https://clem_git)   " theme: [custom.scss] code-copy: true center-title-slide: false highlight-style: a11y code-link: true code-overflow: wrap height: 1080 width: 1600 execute: eval: true echo: true freeze: auto ---

Présentation de `TidyModels`

R addict

Clément Rieux, consultant en data science chez EDF

22 Septembre 2022


``{=html}   [github.com/clem_rxx/presentation](https://github.com/clem/pres) ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rstudio/hex-stickers/master/SVG/tidymodels.svg){.absolute top="425" left="1100" width="300"} ## Tidymodels > **tidymodels** est une collection de packages de modélisation qui est semblable à tidyverse. Créé par l'auteur de **caret** : Max Kuhn. . . . ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidymodels) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────── tidymodels ## 0.1.4 ── ## ✔ broom 0.7.11 ✔ recipes 0.1.17 ## ✔ dials 0.0.10 ✔ rsample 0.1.1 ## ✔ dplyr 1.0.7 ✔ tibble 3.1.7 ## ✔ ggplot2 3.3.6 ✔ tidyr 1.1.4 ## ✔ infer 1.0.0 ✔ tune 0.1.6 ## ✔ modeldata 0.1.1 ✔ workflows 0.2.4 ## ✔ parsnip 0.1.7 ✔ workflowsets 0.1.0 ## ✔ purrr 0.3.4 ✔ yardstick 0.0.9 ## ── Conflicts ───────────────────────────────────────── ## tidymodels_conflicts() ── ## ✖ purrr::discard() masks scales::discard() ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ## ✖ recipes::step() masks stats::step() ``` ::: . . . - `rsample` : Data splitting et resampling - `broom` : Manipulation des données output - `recipes` : Préparation des données avant modélisation - `parsnip` : Collection de modèles - `yardstick` : Evaluation metrics - `dials/tune` : Tuning des paramètres - `worklows` : Création de workflow ... ## Objectifs . . . - Encourager les bonnes méthodologies . . . - Construire une structure stable . . . - Permettre une grande variété de méthodologies ## Comment préparer les données avec tidymodels step\_\*() ## Comment préparer les données avec tidymodels - `step_impute*()` Imputation des données - `step_impute_mean()` - `step_impute_linear()` - `step_log()` - `step_mutate()` - `step_sqrt()` - `step_cut()` - `step_dummy()` - `step_center()` - `step_normalize()` - `step_corr()` - `step_zv()` ## Comment choisir un modèle avec tidymodels 1. Choisir un modèle 2. Sélectionner le mode (Si nécessaire) 3. Paramètrer le engine ## 1. Choisir un modèle Pour avoir la liste des modèles disponibles : ## 1. Choisir un modèle Régression linéaire ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} linear_reg(penalty = NULL, mixture = NULL) ``` ::: . . . Random Forest ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rand_forest(mtry = NULL, trees = NULL, min_n = NULL) ``` ::: ## 2. Sélectionner le mode ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} linear_reg() %>% set_mode(mode = "regression") ``` ::: . . . ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} logistic_reg() %>% set_mode(mode = "classification") ``` ::: ## 3. Paramètrer le engine ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} linear_reg() %>% set_engine("spark" ) ``` ::: . . . ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rand_forest() %>% set_engine("randomForest") ``` ::: . . . ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rand_forest() %>% set_engine("ranger") ``` ::: ## Exemple de classification ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {style="text-align: center"} `Données` :::
::: {style="font-size: 0.75em"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} | age| gender| height| weight| steps| hear_rate| calories| distance| entropy_heart| entropy_setps| resting_heart| corr_heart_steps| norm_heart| intensity_karvonen| sd_norm_heart| steps_times_distance|device |activity | |---:|------:|------:|------:|--------:|---------:|----------:|---------:|-------------:|-------------:|-------------:|----------------:|----------:|------------------:|-------------:|--------------------:|:-----------|:--------| | 20| 1| 168| 65.4| 10.77143| 78.53130| 0.3445329| 0.0083269| 6.221612| 6.116349| 59| 1.0000000| 19.53130| 0.1385199| 1.000000| 0.0896921|apple watch |Lying | | 20| 1| 168| 65.4| 11.47532| 78.45339| 3.2876255| 0.0088963| 6.221612| 6.116349| 59| 1.0000000| 19.45339| 0.1379673| 1.000000| 0.1020885|apple watch |Lying | | 20| 1| 168| 65.4| 12.17922| 78.54083| 9.4840000| 0.0094658| 6.221612| 6.116349| 59| 1.0000000| 19.54083| 0.1385874| 1.000000| 0.1152865|apple watch |Lying | | 20| 1| 168| 65.4| 12.88312| 78.62826| 10.1545556| 0.0100353| 6.221612| 6.116349| 59| 1.0000000| 19.62826| 0.1392075| 1.000000| 0.1292863|apple watch |Lying | | 20| 1| 168| 65.4| 13.58701| 78.71569| 10.8251111| 0.0106048| 6.221612| 6.116349| 59| 0.9828157| 19.71569| 0.1398276| 0.241567| 0.1440877|apple watch |Lying | | 20| 1| 168| 65.4| 14.29091| 78.80313| 11.4956667| 0.0111743| 6.221612| 6.116349| 59| 1.0000000| 19.80313| 0.1404477| 0.264722| 0.1596909|apple watch |Sitting | ::: ::: ::: ::: {style="text-align: center"} ::: ## Exemple de classification ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(123) data_split <- initial_split(df, strata = activity) ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} data_split ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` <2740/916/3656> ``` ::: :::
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} train_data <- training(data_split) test_data <- testing(data_split) ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} nrow(train_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 2740 ``` ::: ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} nrow(test_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 916 ``` ::: ::: ## Exemple de classification ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} df_rec = recipe(activity ~ . , data = train_data) ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} df_rec ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Recipe Inputs: role #variables outcome 1 predictor 17 ``` ::: ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} summary(df_rec) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 18 × 4 variable type role source 1 age numeric predictor original 2 gender numeric predictor original 3 height numeric predictor original 4 weight numeric predictor original 5 steps numeric predictor original 6 hear_rate numeric predictor original 7 calories numeric predictor original 8 distance numeric predictor original 9 entropy_heart numeric predictor original 10 entropy_setps numeric predictor original 11 resting_heart numeric predictor original 12 corr_heart_steps numeric predictor original 13 norm_heart numeric predictor original 14 intensity_karvonen numeric predictor original 15 sd_norm_heart numeric predictor original 16 steps_times_distance numeric predictor original 17 device nominal predictor original 18 activity nominal outcome original ``` ::: ::: ## Exemple de classification ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} df_rec = recipe(activity ~ . , data = train_data) %>% step_num2factor(gender, transform = function(x) x + 1, levels = c('femme', 'homme')) %>% step_rm(device) %>% step_dummy(all_nominal_predictors()) %>% step_normalize(all_numeric()) %>% step_zv(all_numeric()) %>% step_corr(all_numeric_predictors(), threshold = 0.7) ``` ::: ## Exemple de classification ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="2-9"} df_rec = recipe(activity ~ . , data = train_data) %>% step_num2factor(gender, transform = function(x) x + 1, levels = c('femme', 'homme')) %>% step_rm(device) %>% step_dummy(all_nominal_predictors()) %>% step_normalize(all_numeric()) %>% step_zv(all_numeric()) %>% step_corr(all_numeric_predictors(), threshold = 0.7) ``` ::: ## Exemple de classification ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="2-4|5|6|7|8|9"} df_rec = recipe(activity ~ . , data = train_data) %>% step_num2factor(gender, transform = function(x) x + 1, levels = c('femme', 'homme')) %>% step_rm(device) %>% step_dummy(all_nominal_predictors()) %>% step_normalize(all_numeric()) %>% step_zv(all_numeric()) %>% step_corr(all_numeric_predictors(), threshold = 0.7) ``` ::: ## Exemple de classification ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} encoded = df_rec %>% prep() %>% juice() ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} | age| weight| steps| calories| entropy_heart| entropy_setps| resting_heart| corr_heart_steps| norm_heart| sd_norm_heart| steps_times_distance|activity | gender_homme| |---------:|----------:|----------:|---------:|-------------:|-------------:|-------------:|----------------:|----------:|-------------:|--------------------:|:--------|------------:| | -1.040763| -0.3697346| -0.6229780| 0.6097959| 0.4528588| 0.3606604| -0.806288| 1.344866| -0.1425708| -0.7808465| -0.3534188|Lying | 1.06468| | -1.040763| -0.3697346| -0.6204065| 0.7022291| 0.4528588| 0.3606604| -0.806288| 1.321581| -0.1389498| -0.8558210| -0.3532882|Lying | 1.06468| | -1.040763| -0.3697346| -0.5766909| 1.3325475| 0.4528588| 0.3606604| -0.806288| 1.344866| -0.0773928| -0.8535320| -0.3499853|Lying | 1.06468| | -1.040763| -0.3697346| -0.5715479| 1.3292048| 0.4528588| 0.3606604| -0.806288| 1.344866| -0.0701508| -0.8535320| -0.3494623|Lying | 1.06468| | -1.040763| -0.3697346| -0.5664048| 1.3258620| 0.4528588| 0.3606604| -0.806288| 1.344866| -0.0629088| -0.8535320| -0.3489110|Lying | 1.06468| | -1.040763| -0.3697346| -0.6006315| 1.6465117| 0.4528588| 0.3606604| -0.806288| -1.365160| -0.0085939| -0.8535320| -0.3522278|Lying | 1.06468| ::: ::: ## Exemple de classification ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rf_spec <- rand_forest(trees = 200) %>% set_engine("ranger", importance = "impurity") %>% set_mode("classification") ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} activity_wflow <- workflow() %>% add_recipe(df_rec) %>% add_model(rf_spec) ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} activty_fit <- activity_wflow %>% fit(data = train_data) ``` ::: ## Exemple Classification ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} predict(activty_fit, test_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 916 × 1 .pred_class 1 Lying 2 Lying 3 Lying 4 Sitting 5 Sitting 6 Self Pace walk 7 Self Pace walk 8 Lying 9 Lying 10 Lying # … with 906 more rows # ℹ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows ``` ::: ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} activity_pred <- augment(activty_fit, test_data) ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} table = activity_pred %>% select(activity, contains(".pred_")) ``` ::: . . . ::: {style="font-size: 0.45em"} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |activity |.pred_class | .pred_Lying| .pred_Running 3 METs| .pred_Running 5 METs| .pred_Running 7 METs| .pred_Self Pace walk| .pred_Sitting| |:--------|:--------------|-----------:|--------------------:|--------------------:|--------------------:|--------------------:|-------------:| |Lying |Lying | 0.5376885| 0.0374524| 0.0519196| 0.0675595| 0.1152192| 0.1901607| |Lying |Lying | 0.4815575| 0.0423690| 0.0238571| 0.0590774| 0.1259127| 0.2672262| |Lying |Lying | 0.4424762| 0.0297579| 0.0264365| 0.0475218| 0.1692540| 0.2845536| |Sitting |Sitting | 0.2001508| 0.0182758| 0.0275615| 0.0166885| 0.2891369| 0.4481865| |Sitting |Sitting | 0.1783532| 0.0185258| 0.0250794| 0.0060635| 0.3084881| 0.4634901| |Sitting |Self Pace walk | 0.1181954| 0.0200446| 0.0149722| 0.0025635| 0.5514500| 0.2927743| ::: ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Performances ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} activity_pred %>% select(-.pred_class) %>% roc_auc(truth = as.factor(activity), contains(".pred_")) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 1 × 3 .metric .estimator .estimate 1 roc_auc hand_till 0.965 ``` ::: ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} activity_pred %>% accuracy(truth = as.factor(activity), .pred_class) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 1 × 3 .metric .estimator .estimate 1 accuracy multiclass 0.790 ``` ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Performances ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} activity_pred %>% conf_mat(activity, .pred_class) %>% autoplot(type = "heatmap") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](site_R_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-33-1.png){fig-align='center' width=960} ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Performances ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} activity_pred %>% select(-.pred_class) %>% roc_curve(truth = as.factor(activity), contains(".pred_")) %>% autoplot() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](site_R_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-34-1.png){fig-align='center' width=960} ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Tuning parameter ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tune_spec <- rand_forest( mtry = tune(), trees = 200, min_n = tune() ) %>% set_mode("classification") %>% set_engine("ranger") ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tune_wf <- workflow() %>% add_recipe(df_rec) %>% add_model(tune_spec) ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(100) cv_folds <- vfold_cv(train_data, v = 3, strata = activity) ``` ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Tuning parameter ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(345) tune_res <- tune_grid( tune_wf, resamples = cv_folds, grid = 20 ) ``` ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Tuning parameter ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} tune_res %>% collect_metrics() %>% filter(.metric == "accuracy") %>% select(mean, min_n, mtry) %>% pivot_longer(min_n:mtry, values_to = "value", names_to = "parameter" ) %>% ggplot(aes(value, mean, color = parameter)) + geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) + facet_wrap(~parameter, scales = "free_x") + labs(x = NULL, y = "ACC") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](site_R_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-40-1.png){fig-align='center' width=960} ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Tuning parameter ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} rf_grid <- grid_regular( min_n(range = c(1, 8)), mtry(range = c(9, 20)), levels = 2 # nombre de niveaux par paramètre ) ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(456) regular_res <- tune_grid( tune_wf, resamples = cv_folds, grid = rf_grid ) ``` ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Tuning parameter ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} regular_res %>% collect_metrics() %>% filter(.metric == "accuracy") %>% select(mean, min_n, mtry) %>% pivot_longer(min_n:mtry, values_to = "value", names_to = "parameter" ) %>% ggplot(aes(value, mean, color = parameter)) + geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) + facet_wrap(~parameter, scales = "free_x") + labs(x = NULL, y = "ACC") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](site_R_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-43-1.png){fig-align='center' width=960} ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Tuning parameter ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} best_acc <- select_best(regular_res, "accuracy") final_rf <- finalize_model( tune_spec, best_acc ) ``` ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Finalisation du workflow ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} final_wf <- workflow() %>% add_recipe(df_rec) %>% add_model(final_rf) ``` ::: . . .
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} final_res <- final_wf %>% last_fit(data_split) # train sur train et evalue sur test ``` ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Performances ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} final_res %>% collect_metrics() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 2 × 4 .metric .estimator .estimate .config 1 accuracy multiclass 0.800 Preprocessor1_Model1 2 roc_auc hand_till 0.969 Preprocessor1_Model1 ``` ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Performances ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} final_res %>% collect_predictions() %>% conf_mat(activity, .pred_class) %>% autoplot(type = "heatmap") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](site_R_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-48-1.png){fig-align='center' width=960} ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Performances ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} final_res %>% collect_predictions() %>% select(-.pred_class) %>% roc_curve(truth = as.factor(activity), contains(".pred_")) %>% autoplot() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](site_R_files/figure-revealjs/unnamed-chunk-49-1.png){fig-align='center' width=960} ::: ::: ## Exemple Classification ### Enregistrement du modèle ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} final_activity_model = final_res %>% extract_workflow() saveRDS(final_activity_model, here::here("data", "activity_wf_model.rds")) ``` :::

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {

      // dispatch for htmlwidgets
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for reveal
    if (window.Reveal) {
      window.Reveal.addEventListener("slidechanged", function(event) {
        fireSlideChanged(event.previousSlide, event.currentSlide);
      });
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
